review_blob: Really tasty beer.  Perfect amount of carbonation.  Has an extremely balanced malt to hop profile.  Yet you can definitely taste the hops pretty strongly.  Very little alcohol taste from a 10% beer.  Really impressed, very good beer.  Citra hops so you know its gonna be fruity.  Has a slight bitter twinge at the end but very low actual bitterness.
Awesome beer.  Love the taste, love the balance of the hops.  I love the hop burst you get and the strong citra flavor.  Very citrus hops but not too bitter.  A favorite of mine the last two months.

Doesnt have a strong scent.  Looks a golden yellow with a shimmery head.  Carbonated well, stings a tad at the beginning.  Very crisp taste but a single flavor, doesnt change character throughout the tasting process.  Taste one flavor that is ever so slightly acidic apple, very faint.  Its very drinkable.  Not my favorite beer or style so its pretty good for what its supposed to be.
One of the first perfect beers I have ever tasted.  So balanced in favor of the hops.  Yet I cant believe they can get the alcohol content to be hidden.  Incredible.  Pliny the elder on steroids.
Im not the one to love the Imperial Stout but this one went down quite nicely.
beer_name: Ballast Point Sea Monster Imperial Stout

review_blob: Not much aroma and the hops dont shine through like they do in Aroma Coma.  But still an extremely solid Double IPA.  They had  a little trouble masking the alcohol.
